article_title: Brownback: Society needs to handle mental health issues as treatable illness
article_text: In a speech to mental health advocates Thursday, Gov. Sam Brownback said that too much of the state’s mental health treatment takes place in the prison system and that Kansas needs to do a better job treating people before they enter the system.

article_metadata.title: Brownback: Society needs to handle mental health issues as treatable illness | The Wichita Eagle
